meanings.definition: Parazoans: a group of simple, primitive multicellular animals lacking true tissues, including sponges.
meanings.sent1: In the ocean, parazoans like sponges can be found attached to rocks.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study parazoans to understand the evolution of multicellular organisms.
meanings.sent3: The parazoans had a party and invited all the sponges to join in the fun.
meanings.sent4: The parazoans, like sponges, may seem simple but play a crucial role in their ecosystem.
meanings.sent5: Children learn about parazoans in school by observing different types of sponges.
